definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.chinese: 是什么造就了一名纵火犯？

sentences.english: Everyone is gonna think I'm an arsonist.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都会认为我是个纵火犯。

sentences.english: The fire was set by an arsonist. ;
The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.english: Senior police confirmed they are preparing photofits of suspected firebugs.
sentences.chinese: 高级警官证实警方正在制作纵火犯的模拟人像。

sentences.english: The factory was destroyed in a fire started by arsonists.
sentences.chinese: 工厂在纵火犯引起的火灾中烧毁了。

sentences.english: Within two hours the arsonist was taken up by the police.
sentences.chinese: 纵火犯在两小时内就被警察抓住了。
他是个被定过罪的纵火犯。

sentences.english: Do you not fear to be punished for arson?
sentences.chinese: 你不怕被当做纵火犯遭到惩罚？

definition: to set on fire/to commit arson
the enemy of the people/the class enemy (Marxism)
to set on fire/to commit arson/to create a disturbance
